title: Jenny Loves Yoga
description: Jenny Loves Yoga is about Jenny and the different yoga poses she does each day to help her grow strong, flexible, and healthy. This introductory text touches on some of the reasons people practice yoga. Photographs show Jenny doing a variety of yoga poses.
highFrequencyWords: balancing, inversion, meditation, pose, salutation, yoga
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
awareness: Proper Nouns                : Understand the capitalization of proper nouns
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
